title: Vervaeke, JBP, Pollan, Worldview Options, Meaning and Transitions
description:
John Vervaeke is doing a series on the meaning crisis and it is well worth watching. Worldview transitions fascinate me and Jordan Peterson and Vervaeke are both working on why we're seeing these transitions today. I look at some elements of Vervaeke's work against the JBP background I've covered previously. 

Meaning Crisis 3 https://youtu.be/C1AaqD8t3pk
Meaning Crisis 4 https://youtu.be/Lhl51bZQlM8
Meaning Crisis Playlist https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLND1JCRq8Vuh3f0P5qjrSdb5eC1ZfZwWJ 

Sam Harris on Joe Rogan https://youtu.be/ZA106wrMUe4
Vervaeke on Ben Boyce https://youtu.be/CBuPbplRZFQ
CS Lewis Miracles https://www.amazon.com/Miracles-C-S-Lewis-ebook/dp/B002BY77FY
GK Chesterton Everlasting Man https://www.amazon.com/Everlasting-Man-G-K-Chesterton-ebook/dp/B00ESQAL56
Are Humans just another primate? https://youtu.be/YWZAL64E0DI
Memories of Alhambra https://youtu.be/2Lcy3XUDd_A
Sitch and Friended https://youtu.be/K4DCk_cNEw4
How to change your mind https://www.amazon.com/Change-Your-Mind-Consciousness-Transcendence-ebook/dp/B076GPJXWZ
